courses.name: JavaScript
courses.discription: JavaScript is a dynamic computer programming language. It is lightweight and most commonly used as a part of web pages, whose implementations allow client-side script to interact with the user and make dynamic pages. It is an interpreted programming language with object-oriented capabilities.

courses.name: HTML
courses.discription: The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. It can be assisted by technologies such as Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) and scripting languages such as JavaScript .

courses.name: CSS
courses.discription: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets and is used by web pages to help keep information in the proper display format. The major purpose of CSS is for describing the presentation of Web pages, including colors, layout, and fonts that allows adapting the presentation to different types of devices, such as large screens, small screens, or printers.
